home.aboutText:
Hello, I am Léo Christophe, a 21-year-old student in my 3rd year of a Bachelor's in Computer Science at the IUT of Annecy. I am passionate about all kinds of development. I have gained significant experience in these fields through my projects.

I am currently looking for a permanent contract (CDI) or an apprenticeship to prepare for a Master's in Computer Science by August/September 2025. If you have a proposal, you can contact me below.

contactSection.contactGifTitle: Contact me if you have an offer or information to share.
contactSection.homeContactDesc: I am currently looking for a company for an apprenticeship contract (Master's) or a permanent position starting August 2025. I am ready to put my skills as a software developer to work on your projects.
contactSection.CTA1: Do you have an offer or information to share? Feel free to

statistics.finishedProjectsTitle: Counting all the projects I have completed
statistics.yearsOfProgrammingTitle: I have been programming for over 5 years
statistics.commitsTitle: I have made over 450 commits on Github in recent years (Commit: Code modification in a project)
statistics.masteredTechTitle: In 4 different languages: PHP, JS, Python, C#. Frameworks: Flask, Blazor, VueJS, Laravel, ASP.NET Core, WPF, and more...

hobbies.animesDescription: I really enjoy Japanese animated works. I started watching anime in 2016, and since then, I have become a big fan of this genre. Especially isekai or comedic anime like Re:Zero.
hobbies.videogamesDescription: I really enjoy creative games like Minecraft. Having played for nearly 10 years, the genre still excites me and continues to inspire me.
hobbies.cookingDescription: I love cooking. Since I was young, I have always enjoyed food, so being able to prepare it with my own touches is a real pleasure.

skills.softskillsDescription: Interpersonal and adaptive abilities that promote collaboration and effective management. (Communication, teamwork, time management, adaptability...)
skills.hardskillsDescription: Specific technical skills related to executing complex tasks in a particular field. (mastery of programming languages, database management, network administration...)

portfolio.email_js_end: library to send emails automatically from the contact form. The form needs Google Recaptcha validation to function. If the user is confirmed as a human, data from the form is sent to EmailJs, sending an e-mail directly into my mailbox.
portfolio.google_recaptcha_details: Use of the Google Recaptcha 3 service to validate the contact form. This service distinguishes humans from robots and ensures that only real users can send messages. Its key difference from the previous version is that it does not require user interaction.
portfolio.rgpd_details: While the site is a portfolio, the use of a traduction system and a captcha system requires the use of cookies. The user can delete them at any time. The site does not use any tracking or advertising cookies. See the

datacare.contributionsDetails: I contributed to the creation of the remote API (Azure), a dashboard, the database, and the client.
datacare.technologiesDetails: Front: Blazor with Bootstrap, Back: API Rest in C# with EntityFramework, Database: Postgresql hosted on AlwaysData, Data Visualization: Grafana, Cloud: Azure
datacare.apiDetails: The Rest API in C# applies best practices in computer development. Asynchronous methods, Data Manager, DTO and AutoMapper, Dependency Injection, Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment, Mock tests
datacare.clientDetailsEnd: (released in 2018), was developed in the most ergonomic way possible. Use of components, including pop-ups or tooltips, Use of the ChartJs and Blazor Bootstrap library, MVVM architecture, Dependency Injection, Continuous Deployment

filters.projectsFiltersKeywordTitle: Keywords to sort projects using the Levenshtein algorithm
filters.projectsTypePersonalTitle: Personal projects are projects I developed myself.
filters.projectsTypeUniversityTitle: Academic projects are projects I developed as part of my studies.

projects.projectsDateError: The end date must be after the start date.

contact.subtitle: Do you have a job offer? Do you want to share your feedback?
contact.emailDisclaimer: Your email will only be used to contact you back.
contact.formDisclaimer: The first name is only used for authentication purposes (optional), and the email is used for contact purposes. Each email is confidential between me and the sender and is directly archived and deleted after reading. EmailJS is used to send emails automatically, and Recaptcha is used for security purposes.
contact.errorMessage: Please try again or contact me directly.
contact.availability: Available from 1 PM to 2 PM and 7 PM to 8 PM.

manage_data.donneesDisclaimer2: You can delete optional (ergonomic) data at any time by clicking the button below.

notfound.title: 404 - Unknown Page
notfound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

cookieBanner.disclaimer: This site uses cookies to improve your user experience. By continuing to browse this site, you accept the

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.intro:
This cookie policy explains what cookies are, 
            how they are used, how third-party services, such as Google Recaptcha, 
            may use them on this site, your choices regarding these cookies, 
            and additional information about their usage.

lang.name: 'lang' Cookie
lang.description: Used to manage the user's language preference. (Functional, Permanent)
lang.details: This cookie is only used to improve ergonomics and present the site in your preferred language.

rc_a.name: 'rc::a' Cookie
rc_a.description: Necessary for the functioning of the captcha service (Google Recaptcha). (Necessary, Permanent)
rc_a.details: This cookie is used to distinguish humans from robots, ensuring that only a real user can interact with the contact form.

rc_c.name: 'rc::c' Cookie
rc_c.description: Used for user sessions related to captcha (Google Recaptcha). (Necessary, Session)
rc_c.details: This cookie is temporary and ensures that a real user fills out the contact form, without retaining personal information beyond the session.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.content:
I am committed to protecting your personal data. The data collected by cookies 
            is exclusively used to improve your user experience (language preferences, project filters), 
            to ensure the proper functioning of the contact form with Recaptcha V3, or to send automatic emails 
            from the contact form. This contact form sends each email directly to my email address and is 
            archived and deleted after reading.

user_rights.title: User Rights
user_rights.content:
You have the right to access, rectify, or delete your data. 
            A dedicated page in the footer allows you to delete your data easily.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For any questions regarding this privacy policy or the use of cookies, 
            please contact me at {email}.

policy_update.title: Policy Update
policy_update.content:
This privacy policy may be updated periodically. 
            Any changes will be displayed here, with the date of the last update indicated at the top of this page.
